Class HighscoreController

java.lang.Object
ch.quizinno.brainquest.controllers.HighscoreController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/highscores") public class HighscoreController extends Object
Controller for managing highscores.

  • Method Details

    • getAllHighscores

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Highscore>> getAllHighscores(@RequestParam(required=false) Long topicId, @RequestParam(required=false) Difficulty difficulty, @RequestParam(required=false,defaultValue="ID") SortBy sortBy, @RequestParam(required=false,defaultValue="ASC") SortDir sortDir, @RequestParam(required=false) Integer limit)
      Retrieves a list of all highscores.
      Parameters:
      topicId - the ID of the topic to filter by
      difficulty - the difficulty to filter by
      sortBy - the field to sort by
      sortDir - the direction to sort by
      limit - the maximum number of highscores to retrieve
      Returns:
      a list of all highscores

      Retrieves a highscore by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the highscore to retrieve
      Returns:
      the highscore with the specified ID

    • updateHighscore

      @PatchMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Highscore> updateHighscore(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody Highscore highscoreDetails)
      Updates a highscore by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the highscore to update
      highscoreDetails - the details of the highscore to update

      the updated highscore

    • deleteHighscore

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> deleteHighscore(@PathVariable Long id)
      Deletes a highscore by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the highscore to delete
      Returns:
      a response entity with no content
